desc: Natural hair and skincare for the eco-conscious beauty lover. Get glowy skin and healthy tresses the natural way. Free UK delivery available.

layout.text: A conscious brand on a mission to incite greater confidence through beautiful hair and skin. Our products are plant and mineral based as well as free from SLS and Parabens. Drawing from the Ayurvedic philosophy, each product has an aromatherapy element to it: calming, balancing, uplifting and energising. We take a minimalist and sustainable approach by sourcing and using natural and organic ingredients sourced from UK based suppliers.
